translations: n.服务；（食品等的）一份；上菜（serving 的复数形式）

sentences.sentence: Quantities will vary according to how many servings of soup you want to prepare.
sentences.translation: 数量取决于你要准备多少份汤。

sentences.sentence: Those involved in the clinical trials on average ate 3.3 servings of pasta a week instead of other carbohydrates, one serving equaling around half a cup.
sentences.translation: 参与临床试验的人平均每周吃3.3份意大利面，而不是其他碳水化合物，其中一份意大利面相当于大约半杯碳水化合物。

sentences.sentence: This recipe will be enough for four servings.
